channel.title: The first update you ever made?
channel.description: Might sound weird, but I'm curious to see if anyone else remembers their first ever update they made to an RSPS. For some reason I can distinctly remember getting my first downloaded source and being amazed at adding some Tzhaar creatures to the middle of Varrock Square. I was so excited to show my brother and everything haha, this was around 2008.

item.title: The first update you ever made?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I wrote an if else statement that converted coins to coin credits. My logic was flawed and people duped the shit out of it.

Read full topic
item.source: The first update you ever made?

item.title: The first update you ever made?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:

Removing all the shops from the server filled with party hats, h’ween masks & the rest of the goodies!

item.title: The first update you ever made?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:

The first update I can remember is adding a bunch of commands that added items. I thought I knew pretty much everything there was to know at that point.

item.source: The first update you ever made?

item.title: The first update you ever made?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I added a command using a command generator. It actually was a delta server, and the generators code gave me tons of errors so my friend had to get on team viewer to help me. pretty hilarious.

I used to go around on r-l status page and login to servers asking if they needed developers, even though basically i just downloaded about every code generator released and that was about the only thing i knew.

Read full topic
item.source: The first update you ever made?

I was so excited to show my brother and everything haha, this was around 2008.
